definition: ghost/demon/terrible/damnable/clever/sly/crafty/(suffix for sb with a certain vice or addiction etc)/one of the 28 constellations
abbr. for the Big Dipper constellation 北斗星[Bei3 dou3 xing1]
to fight/to struggle/to condemn/to censure/to contend/to put together/coming together
dry measure for grain equal to ten 升[sheng1] or one-tenth of a 石[dan4]/decaliter/peck/cup or dipper shaped object/old variant of 陡[dou3]
criminal ringleader, main offender (idiom); main culprit/fig. main cause of a disaster
criminal ringleader/chief culprit/fig. cause of a problem
the queen of flowers (refers esp. to plum blossom)/(fig.) nickname for a famous beauty or courtesan
stars of the Big Dipper that constitute the rectangular body of the dipper/Kuixing, Daoist God of fate
Quebec city, capital of Quebec province of Canada
main offender, criminal ringleader (idiom); main culprit/fig. main cause of a disaster

sentences.english: LeiYuan is a man of true temperament, vowed to Quebec accounted for when blood.
sentences.chinese: 雷远是个真性情的汉子，誓要张占魁血债血偿。

sentences.english: Yang Jinwei see Quebec accounted for lynching, grim-faced trying to explain.
sentences.chinese: 杨晋纬见张占魁公报私仇，气得面色铁青极力解释。

sentences.english: Madam Hooch is the Quidditch coach and flying instructor at Hogwarts.
sentences.chinese: 霍琦夫人是霍格沃茨的魁地奇教练和飞行课教员。

sentences.english: Madam Hooch is the resident Quidditch expert.
sentences.chinese: 霍琦夫人是固有的魁地奇专家。

sentences.english: This year's Quidditch World Cup should be dedicated to their memory; it will be a chance to heal.
sentences.chinese: 今年的魁地奇世界杯应缅怀这些人，作为愈伤的良机。

sentences.english: It was advertised at the Quidditch World Cup.
sentences.chinese: 此产品曾在魁地奇世界杯上作过广告。

sentences.english: The sexual gland developed fastest at the water temperature above 16℃.
sentences.chinese: 水温16℃以上是魁蚶亲贝性腺成熟的迅速期。

sentences.english: Will there be a new Quidditch Match?
sentences.chinese: 电影中会有新的魁地奇比赛吗？

sentences.english: She referees the Quidditch matches between the house teams.
sentences.chinese: 她负责裁判学员队之间的魁地奇比赛。

definition: to respect/to admire/to venerate/by the emperor himself
variant of 夭[yao1]/to die young/to die prematurely/Taiwan pr. [yao3]
surname Lou/one of the 28 lunar mansions in Chinese astronomy
surname Qi/also used in place names
